import React, { useState } from 'react' function Signup() { const [formData, setformData] = useState({ firstName:'', lastname:'', email:'', mobile:'', password:'' }) const onChangeHandler =(event) =>{ setformData(()=>({ ...formData, [event.target.name]:event.target.value })) } return (

onChangeHandler(event)}/>
